naming_requirements.description: Product names should be no longer than 90 characters.
Start with the most defining parts of your product title.
Create a unique product name that is not used verbatim on other websites.
If color is a notable feature, include it in the product name.
Use available variant attributes only in Key Features & Description, not in the product name.
Capitalize the first letter of each word, excluding articles and conjunctions, unless legally required.
The title should include subject keywords that describe the product.
Do not use characters like '~', '!', '$', or '&' unless representing the brand.
Do not include promotional phrases such as 'best selling' or 'free shipping'.
Do not use 'or' in the title when it implies multiple product types.
